page.title: 15JEWELLERY AND HAIRSTYLES
page.content: Expensive {jewellery}is always in fashion. Women wear {costume jewellery as it is cheaper. This is made mainly from plastic. It comes in a range of colours. The fashionable colours are pastel shades. There is also jewellery for men.They wear{gold chains}and identity bracelets. { Belts }can be worn any way. Younger people buy thicker belts.A lot of men wear{leather belts. { Makeup} is worn by most women and teenagers.Teenagers tend to choose dramatic colours,but older people tend to be more subtle.The most popular colour in eyeshadow is light pink and for lipsticks it is shades of red.Many of people have their hair highlighted or dyed. The most fashionable colour is red. Mainly punks have their hair dyed.To have your hair highlighted it is Â£10.
